one_reviews_text: funny game.much levels,good shooting.i play only 4 level,but i not crazy  buy  the power up any time i start a new level and shotgun is nedless.only first impression.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T-7p4L7UXps (Please Note: links might not work from Oculus so please search YouTube for 'Paradise Decay VR D*** Wilde 2')

My Quick Thoughts:
A very polished and colorful wave shooter with great mechanics and addictive gameplay.
A lot of wave shooters in VR are just generic attempts at making a VR game. 
D*** Wilde 2 already has a pedigree and takes all the best elements from it's previous game and builds on it. Great visuals, combat and sound design give this game a genuine arcade feeling.
I also loved the fact that you are now on a raft moving through the levels.
